price_ranges.budget: $179.99 - $499.99 (Shark ION R75, Narwal Freo S, Shark Navigator)
price_ranges.mid_range: $500 - $999 (Shark PowerDetect, Ecovacs T50 PRO, Narwal Freo Pro, Roborock Qrevo series)

verification_notes: All product URLs tested and verified as active pages
Prices verified from official brand websites where available
Some products show 'Contact for price' as pricing varies by region or is not publicly listed
Some Ecovacs US pricing sourced from UAE site as US site was inaccessible during research
Costco and third-party retailer prices noted but official MSRP prioritized
research_limitations: Ecovacs US website had access restrictions; pricing sourced from international sites
Some products recently launched may not have finalized pricing
Promotional/holiday pricing may differ from regular MSRP

methodology: Products researched using official brand websites, verified through web crawling and extraction of product pages, cross-referenced with third-party retailers for price verification. All URLs tested for accessibility. Focus on currently available models as of January 2026.
